text:
In GUI version 2.4 r961953 when Ctrl-E pressed or "Clear All" selected the following error is logged and it doesn't appear to clear all listeners.

Statistical Agregate report installed
http://rubenlaguna.com/wp/better-jmeter-graphs/

Google Plugins installed
http://code.google.com/p/jmeter-plugins/
